summary: Seven years after the defeat of the Spiral King, Simon and the Dai-Gurren brigade must set out to the vastness of space to defeat a new threat and save the universe. The last high-stakes battle for Simon and his team is about to begin.
cast: Marina Inoue|Tetsuya Kakihara|Katsuyuki Konishi|Michael C. Pizzuto
title: Gurren Lagann: Las luces en el cielo son estrellas
